title: Blockchain Certificates Certificate Schema, Version 1.2
description: Extends the Open Badges Certificate Schema for certificates on the blockchain

JsonLdType.description: A type or an array of types that the certificate represents. The first or only item should be 'Certificate', and any others should each be an IRI (usually a URL) corresponding to a definition of the type itself. In almost all cases, there will be only one type: 'Certificate'

id.description: URI link to a JSON that describes the type of certificate. Default format is https://[domain]/criteria/[year]/[month]/[certificate_title].json.

image.description: Data URI; a base-64 encoded png image of the certificate's image. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_URI_scheme

language.description: Represents the ieft language and ieft country codes. Format is [ieft_language]-[IEFT_COUNTRY]. V1.2 changes: this field is optional

subtitle.description: Subtitle of the certificate. V1.2 changes: this type is now string, and this field is optional

title.description: Title of the certificate. Note: this is called 'name' in the OBI schema
